name: Note: I think spatial computing is an exciting concept, but its going to take years and years of iteration and cost reduction for it to be mass-market.

content.html: Note: I think spatial computing is an exciting concept, but its going to take years and years of iteration and cost reduction for it to be mass-market.
content.value: Note: I think spatial computing is an exciting concept, but its going to take years and years of iteration and cost reduction for it to be mass-market.

summary: @jonathan totally. A few years ago, I naively believed we were a lot closer than we actually are.

content.html: @jonathan totally. A few years ago, I naively believed we were a lot closer than we actually are.
content.value: @jonathan totally. A few years ago, I naively believed we were a lot closer than we actually are.

summary: @jonathan And it will rely heavily on a brittle supply chain for highly specialized parts for a computing system that benefits well-sighted users with high degree of mobility.

content.html: @jonathan And it will rely heavily on a brittle supply chain for highly specialized parts for a computing system that benefits well-sighted users with high degree of mobility.
content.value: @jonathan And it will rely heavily on a brittle supply chain for highly specialized parts for a computing system that benefits well-sighted users with high degree of mobility.

summary: @agentultra Indeed. Apple has a great track record on accessibility, and its early days, so I am going to give them the benefit of the doubt that the story will improve there. On the supply chain front, I think at first it’ll be such a drop in the bucket given the price point and current target audience. Over time, that will change.

content.html: @agentultra Indeed. Apple has a great track record on accessibility, and its early days, so I am going to give them the benefit of the doubt that the story will improve there. On the supply chain front, I think at first it’ll be such a drop in the bucket given the price point and current target audience. Over time, that will change.
content.value: @agentultra Indeed. Apple has a great track record on accessibility, and its early days, so I am going to give them the benefit of the doubt that the story will improve there. On the supply chain front, I think at first it’ll be such a drop in the bucket given the price point and current target audience. Over time, that will change.

summary: You'd better let Apple know in case that hasn't occurred to them.
